bioconda.name: dialign-tx
bioconda.summary: DIALIGN-TX is a greedy and progressive approaches for segment-based multiple sequence alignment.

biotools.summary: DIALIGN-TX is an update to DIALIGN. It combines the greedy heuristic method of DIALIGN with a traditional progressive method.

bioschemas.name: DIALIGN-TX
bioschemas.summary: DIALIGN-TX is an update to DIALIGN. It combines the greedy heuristic method of DIALIGN with a traditional progressive method.
